DOC.brief_summary: The aim pilot study examine brief manualized treatment , Emotional Regulation Group Skills Training ( ERG ST ) , show promise high-risk youth present range mental health concern . The investigator examine effectiveness ERG ST group , well two additional component client randomize : motivational enhancement ( ME ) pre-treatment , family skill treatment ( FAM ) . This project first combine test module transdiagnostic early intervention youth early stage mental illness . This pilot trial answer follow question : 1 ) What response rate ERG ST compare ERG ST plus FAM , benefit ? 2 ) What response rate ME pre-treatment , benefit ? 3 ) What acceptability treatment ? The ME pre-treatment consist four weekly one half hour session . The 12-week ERG ST consist 12 weekly two-hour session 4-12 youth per group . The 12-week FAM consist 12 weekly two-hour session , 16-20 caregiver per group . This study use two-stage randomization design allow balance group differential attrition pre-treatment . The following four treatment combination : ERG ST ; ERG ST+FAM ; ME+ERG ST ; ME+ERG ST+FAM . Four subject enrol study randomize . The primary outcome improve emotion dysregulation participant . Emotion dysregulation measure use Difficulties Emotion Regulation Scales ( DERS ) .
